data.eml:eml: New records of doryctine wasps (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Argentina, with the description of Shawius diiorioi Martínez sp. nov.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martínez, Juan José (2016): New records of doryctine wasps (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Argentina, with the description of Shawius diiorioi Martínez sp. nov. Zootaxa 4168 (2): 347-352, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4168.2.8
